short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically remove the background from the image in 1 click and show you a net cutout with a natural look.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AnyEraser is an efficient and reliable tool when you try to eliminate a cluttered image background. Its automatic removal service relieves you from the dull painting over the background. The whole operation requires only one manual step - uploading a photo. Then, the AI-powered tool will isolate the background from the image and then remove it without destroying the subject.

‚ú® Key features ‚ú® :
üèπ Make background transparent in 1 click: You could be amazed at how efficient the online one-click removal tool is.AnyEraser can take the background out of the picture instantly after you upload an image, saving you from holding the mouse tightly to smear over the background.
üìç Backed up by AI: Popular AI technology has played a vital part in the recent photo editing market, simplifying photo editing operations. This tool keeps pace with the trend and delivers the simplest way to remove the image background.
üíó Change background color: After removing the original dull background, you can change the transparent background color to achieve different effects. For example, you can add a white background to emphasize the subject's characteristics or replace a brilliant color to catch people's attention.

How to use the background remover?
1. Install the image background remover extension to your Chrome.
2. Open it and upload your photo to it.
3. Get a photo with a transparent background, and you can further edit it.
4. Finally, export the satisfactory image.

üåà Notice:
To learn more about this image background remover, please visit https://anyeraser.com.
If you have problems when using it or have some suggestions to share, please contact support@anyeraser.com.
